display_name: Columbia Suicide Severity Ratings Scale: In your lifetime, have you worked out the details of how to kill yourself? Do you intend to carry out this plan?
description:
Item from a modified version of the CSSRS Questionnaire. [Salvi 2019 (PMID: 31039299)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7974826/)

Original Text: Please answer the following questions regarding your lifetime
